game.description: The village of Oakwood is plagued by a series of mysterious disappearances. The villagers are afraid to leave their homes and the local lord has offered a generous reward for anyone brave enough to investigate.
game.objective: Investigate the strange occurrences in Oakwood village.

reward.item: A fine silver pendant with a small gemstone

tasks.description: Speak to the villagers and gather information about the disappearances.
Investigate the local mine where several of the missing people were last seen.
tasks.objective: Find any clues that may indicate what is happening to the missing villagers.

tasks.description: Confront the dark force responsible for the disappearances and put an end to it.
tasks.location: Abandoned Windmill on the outskirts of Oakwood
tasks.objective: Defeat the source of the darkness.

game.title: The Darkness in Oakwood
